short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wordle Companion enables you to play Wordle by selecting guesses from an auto-generated list instead of typing guesses manually.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is meant to be used while playing Wordle. It will suggest potential guesses for you to choose from.
